channel.title: Login Box

item.title: Login Box
item.dc:creator: @Sixela Sixela
item.description:
@Sixela wrote:

Alright could you give me steps to do move it to the cache?

Read full topic

item.title: Login Box
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

does it already have a custom login box?
if not its probably still getting the image from the cache. so you will have to pack the custom titlebox into the cache or make your own custom sprite loader for the login box.

Read full topic

item.title: Login Box
item.dc:creator: @Sixela Sixela
item.description:
@Sixela wrote:

Today, I edited my old client from back then…The title box was still old and I edited the current one using photoshop but it wont show the login box, I checked the Class 30 Sub 2 1 1 folder and I found out that it isn’t loaing the title box and button…I’m not really sure how to make it load the title box and I was wondering if anyone knew how to get it to load the title box and button. here’s part of my class 30 file.
